name: The devil's trial's
description: You were willingly participating in an experiment for a supposed friend, turns out him and others were doing under the radar 'disposals' of marines that crossed them in the wrong way. They sent you to a temple in hell, an arena of sorts. Where the worst of the worst is present around every corner, will you fight your way out and reveal this plot? Or will you let the dark habits of corrupt UAC scientists end in your bloodshed? It's your choice, but be aware, when most people who have to choose life over death.
